info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 11:06PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Convective showers with gusty winds will impact portions of north central Lewis and Clark, southeastern Pondera, Teton and northwestern Cascade Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1105 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds along a line extending from 10 miles south of Valier to 7 miles east of Augusta. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Choteau, Fairfield, Dutton, Augusta, Fort Shaw, Brady, Fort Shaw, Power, Pishkun Reservoir, Sun River, Collins, Bynum, Pendroy, Farmington and Simms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
